alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL PASSAIC...NORTHWESTERN BERGEN...SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sloatsburg, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monsey, Ringwood, Suffern, Warwick, Sloatsburg, Greenwood Lake, Pomona, Harriman, Spring Valley, Airmont, Viola, Wesley Hills, New Hempstead, Montebello, and Hillburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
